Item Description: Organic Cotton Essential Classic Pique Polo Shirt
Enriched Description: Ever since it was first introduced, the pique polo shirt was destined to become the icon it now is. Lightly textured fabrics and a placket neckline add interest, while the longer hem at the back is a functional nod to the heritage of the style. Able to be dressed up or left as an informal piece, the Pique Polo shirt is a must-have for your wardrobe. Relaxed fit – the classic Superdry fit. Not too slim, not too loose, just right. Made with organic cotton grown using natural rather than chemical pesticides and fertilisers. The healthier soil this creates uses up to 80% less water which is better for our planet and for the farmers who grow it.

Item Description: Organic Cotton Vintage Logo Zip Hoodie
Enriched Description: Here at Superdry, we recognise that sometimes less is more. Our Organic Cotton Vintage Logo Zip Hoodie embraces minimalism and has an array of colour options for you to choose from. With premium-quality to maximise your comfort and a classic design so you can get an authentic vibe. Relaxed fit – the classic Superdry fit. Not too slim, not too loose, just right. Go for your normal size, Drawstring hood, Zip fastening, Twin pockets, Ribbed cuffs and hem, Brushed lining, Embroidered logo. Made with organic cotton grown using natural rather than chemical pesticides and fertilisers. The healthier soil this creates uses up to 80% less water which is better for our planet and for the farmers who grow it.

Style and sportswear aren't the only things these flexible shorts combine. Featuring an innovative hybrid design that offers cooling mesh technology at the back, these are an excellent way to stay comfortable for any intense workout. Don't let yourself be distracted from your training sessions, either; the zip pockets will ensure that your valuables stay together, so your hands can be free for you to reach out and hit your fitness goals. Breathable fabric - Allows air and moisture to pass through the material to help keep you comfortable, Moisture-wicking - Helps to regulate your body temperature by drawing perspiration away from the body and allowing moisture to disperse from the outer face of the fabric, Stretch two ways - The fabric can stretch in two directions for improved fit and comfort, Elasticated waistband with internal drawcord, Two zip side pockets with branded cord pullers, Mesh back, Leg side vents, Printed logo on the left leg, Printed detailing on the back of the right leg.

Item Description: Organic Cotton High Rise Skinny Denim Jeans
Enriched Description: How did we survive before denim? It's been a wardrobe staple for generations and it looks set to continue. And our high-rise skinny jeans are here to make sure it stays that way. Designed with a flattering high rise and skinny leg cut, how you style these jeans is entirely up to you, which is why denim is so inclusive and so long-lived. Skinny Fit. Fitting where they touch, as that’s what they’re designed to do. With a hint of stretch just to make sure, they’re cut to cling close, right from your seat through the thigh and down to a narrow ankle – the ultimate rock star look., Classic five-pocket design, Button fastening with zip fly, Comfort stretch, Branded hardware, Waist logo patch, Coin pocket logo.

Joggers have become a staple of the laid-back and casual lifestyle, allowing you to be your authentic self when you're off-duty. Our iconic embroidered logo features in a subtle tonal finish that matches the fabric to add a touch of class to the everyday hero that are the Organic Cotton Essential joggers. The healthier soil this creates uses significantly less water which is better for our planet and for the farmers who grow it. We use recycled materials from a number of sources to make our garments, giving discarded materials a new purpose, saving waste, and reducing the amount of carbon emitted in this garment’s production compared to conventional alternatives.

Its flat-locked seams ensure that your training gear isn't a distraction when you're putting in the hard yards. Relaxed: A classic fit. Not too slim, not too tight – no distractions here, Moisture-wicking - Helps to regulate your body temperature by drawing perspiration away from the body and allowing moisture to disperse from the outer face of the fabric, Crew neck, Raglan sleeves, Flatlocked seams, Superdry Sport prints. Strong style, strong performance. Superdry Sport blends innovation and quality with a sense of style. We use recycled materials from a number of sources to make our garments, giving discarded materials a new purpose, saving waste, and reducing the amount of carbon emitted in this garment’s production compared to conventional alternatives.
